finder.query: WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND SER_OWNR_ID = ?serOwnrId01? AND MDSE_CD = ?mdseCd01? AND KEY_INFO_CD_01 = ?keyInfoCd_0101? AND KEY_INFO_CD_02 = ?keyInfoCd_0201? AND KEY_INFO_CD_03 = ?keyInfoCd_0301? AND KEY_INFO_CD_04 = ?keyInfoCd_0401? AND KEY_INFO_CD_05 = ?keyInfoCd_0501? AND KEY_INFO_CD_06 = ?keyInfoCd_0601? AND KEY_INFO_CD_07 = ?keyInfoCd_0701? AND KEY_INFO_CD_08 <= 200 AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY KEY_INFO_CD_08 ASC

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND SER_OWNR_ID = ?serOwnrId01? AND MDSE_CD = ?mdseCd01? AND KEY_INFO_CD_01 = ?keyInfoCd_0101? AND KEY_INFO_CD_02 = ?keyInfoCd_0201? AND KEY_INFO_CD_03 = ?keyInfoCd_0301? AND KEY_INFO_CD_04 = ?keyInfoCd_0401? AND KEY_INFO_CD_05 = ?keyInfoCd_0501? AND KEY_INFO_CD_08 <= 200 AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY KEY_INFO_CD_08 ASC
WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND SER_NUM_SEND_FLG = ?serNumSendFlg01? ORDER BY PO_SER_NUM_PK ASC
WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND KEY_INFO_CD_01 = ?keyInfoCd_0101? AND KEY_INFO_CD_02 = ?keyInfoCd_0201? AND KEY_INFO_CD_03 = ?keyInfoCd_0301? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PO_SER_NUM_PK ASC
